/**
 * Import/Export Types - Type definitions for data import and export
 */// CSV field mappings for different import sources
export const TODOIST_FIELD_MAPPINGS=[{source:'Content',target:'text',required:true},{source:'Description',target:'description',required:false},{source:'Priority',target:'priority',required:false,transform:v=>{const p=v.toLowerCase();if(p.includes('high')||p==='p1'||p==='4')return'high';if(p.includes('medium')||p==='p2'||p==='3')return'medium';return'low';}},{source:'Due Date',target:'dueDate',required:false},{source:'Labels',target:'category',required:false},{source:'Completed',target:'completed',required:false,transform:v=>v==='TRUE'}];export const TRELLO_FIELD_MAPPINGS=[{source:'Card Name',target:'text',required:true},{source:'Description',target:'description',required:false},{source:'Due Date',target:'dueDate',required:false},{source:'Labels',target:'category',required:false},{source:'Completed',target:'completed',required:false,transform:v=>v==='TRUE'}];export const GENERIC_FIELD_MAPPINGS=[{source:'Task',target:'text',required:true},{source:'Title',target:'text',required:false},{source:'Name',target:'text',required:false},{source:'Description',target:'description',required:false},{source:'Notes',target:'description',required:false},{source:'Priority',target:'priority',required:false},{source:'Due Date',target:'dueDate',required:false},{source:'DueDate',target:'dueDate',required:false},{source:'Category',target:'category',required:false},{source:'Tags',target:'category',required:false},{source:'Completed',target:'completed',required:false},{source:'Done',target:'completed',required:false},{source:'Status',target:'status',required:false}];// Export data structure
